TopicTitle: World War Kerbal Edition spaceplane help

Articles.Content:
Hello everybody, Commander Sonic here, I am making a war save and I was hoping that anyone would know what kind of sstos and spaceplanes I should use. THNX:D your help is appreciated dearly.

Edited November 6, 2015 by CommanderSonic
Check out my company weve got some great warships, if that's what youre lookin for.

First You have to install Firespitter mod and KAX mods.

For weapon You have to install : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131931-WW2-Aircraft-Weapons-For-BDA
